hero.desc: Waxaan ka caawinaynaa shirkadaha Noorwiijiga inay helaan alaab sax ah qiime ku habboon iyadoo tayada & u hoggaansanaantu muhiim tahay.

services.title: Adeegyadayada
services.sub: Xal dhamaystiran oo loogu talagalay baahiyaha iibsiga ee shirkadaha Noorwiijiga

why.title: Maxaad noo dooranaysaa?
why.sub: Awooddeenu waa khibradda, shabakadda iyo u heellanaanta tayada

network.title: Shabakaddeenna caalamiga ah
network.sub: Xiriirro la aasaasay oo lala leeyahay alaab-qeybiyeyaal tayo leh dunida oo dhan

flex.title: Xalal gaarsiin dabacsan
flex.sub: Waxaan u habaynnaa habka gaadiidka baahiyahaaga & waqtiga kama dambaysta ah

coffee.title: Qaxwo
coffee.desc: Keenista qaxwo tayo sare leh oo ka timaadda gobollada ugu fiican.

textiles.title: Dharka
textiles.desc: Soo dejin dhar ka imanaya alaab-qeybiyeyaal lagu kalsoonaan karo oo diiradda saaraya tayo & waaraansho.

handicrafts.title: Farshaxan
handicrafts.desc: Alaabo farshaxan iyo gacmo-farsamo oo tayo sare leh.

raw.title: Khayraad Asal ah
raw.desc: Soo dejin agab iyo walxo ceeriin oo loogu talagalay warshadaha & soo saarista.

industry.title: Warshadaha
industry.desc: Alaabooyin & qalab warshadeed oo loogu talagalay shirkadaha Noorwiijiga.

import.title: Soo Dejinta
import.desc: Adeegyo soo dejin dhamaystiran oo diiradda saaraya hufnaan & tayo.

sea.title: Gaadiidka Badda
sea.desc: Kharash-ku-ool marka ay tiro badan tahay

air.title: Qaadka Hawada
air.desc: Gaarsiin degdeg ah oo loogu talagalay alaab cusub

network.title: Shabakad Caalami ah
network.desc: Xiriirro la aasaasay oo lala leeyahay alaab-qeybiyeyaal la isku halayn karo

team.title: Koox Khibrad Leh
team.desc: Khabiirro aqoon qoto dheer u leh suuqyada caalamiga ah

quality.title: Tayo Talaabo Kasta
quality.desc: Kormeer & xaqiijin dhamaystiran oo alaab kasta ah

speed.title: Gaarsiin Degdeg ah
speed.desc: Habraacyo hufan si loo helo waqtiga gaarsiinta ugu gaaban

compliance.title: Shahaado & U Hoggaansanaan
compliance.desc: Hubin in alaabtu la jaanqaaddo heerarka Noorwiijiga & caalamiga ah

pricing.title: Shuruudo Tartan leh
pricing.desc: Qiimayaasha ugu fiican iyada oo loo marayo wada xaajood xooggan

contact.title: La Xidhiidh
contact.body: Waxaad si toos ah noogu soo diri kartaa fariin adigoo isticmaalaya foomka hoose
contact.error: ❌ Khalad ayaa dhacay, fadlan isku day mar kale

footer.blurb: Lammaane lagu kalsoonaan karo oo kuu fududeynaya soo iibsiga & soo dejinta Norway. Waxaan hubinaa tayo, u hoggaansanaan & qiimo tartan leh.
